field.name: survey_result
field.p: It’s so great that you are interested in getting more facts, information and numbers from us! For about 70 years we at Compassion attach a great deal of importance to the efficiency of invested funds in the fight against extreme poverty and for the childrens’ development.
Thank you for your trust. We commit to informing you about the impact of your support for children in the Global South.

Did you know? We guarantee that at least 80% of sponsorship donations - for gifts to your sponsored child and fund donations up to 100% - are invested in projects and programmes in the countries of the South. Thank you for the considerable impact you’ve already made.
Why not take a look at our latest updates?

field.name: survey_result
field.p: It’s so great that your faith inspires your generous giving. It’s also delightful that you seek to know your sponsored child and Compassion on a deeper, more personal level. Thank you from the bottom of our hearts. Thanks to our holistic approach to child development, we commit to a personal and all-round support to the child on a physical, cognitive, socio-emotional and spiritual level through one of the 8000 Compassion partner churches.
You can join us by making a spiritual impact in the lives of children in need through prayer and even get children in your surroundings involved in this endeavour.
